definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

pinyin: gong1 neng2 xing4 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4
gong1 neng2 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4 shu4

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the glyceryl polyether by nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 用核磁共振分析了甘油聚醚。

sentences.english: Functional magnetic resonance imaging of activity in the subjects' brains hints at a possible explanation.
sentences.chinese: 受試者的大腦活動的核磁共振成像暗示着一個解釋。

sentences.english: The structures of both are characterized by FT-TR and 1H-NMR.
sentences.chinese: 藉助紅外光譜和1H核磁共振譜圖分析了產物的結構。

sentences.english: The 13C-NMR and 1H-NMR spectra were reported for the macrocyclic polyaryl-ester oligomer.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了環狀聚芳酯低聚物的核磁共振碳譜及氫譜。

sentences.english: Results The structure of the target molecule was identified by 1H NMR, 13C NMR and element analysis.
sentences.chinese: 結果最終產物由核磁共振譜和元素分析進行結構鑑定。

sentences.english: And yet, according to the MRI, my libido is surprisingly strong.
sentences.chinese: 然而，根據核磁共振成像，我的性驅力出人意料的強。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the hepatic MRI dynamic contrast-enhanced effect with the hand bolus injection method.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討手推法對肝臟磁共振動態增強效果的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of MR imaging in diagnosing the injury of the tendon of tibialis posterior muscle.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價磁共振在脛後肌腱損傷中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the image characteristics and quality of MR plain scan with breath-holding in normal lungs.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價正常肺磁共振屏氣平掃的圖像特徵和質量。

sentences.english: NMR and FTIR were used to characterize the structure of terminal groups of the copolyethers.
sentences.chinese: 利用核磁共振法表徵了雙丁基聚醚的端基結構。

sentences.english: The research of digital pre-emphasis gradient waveform generator.
sentences.chinese: 磁共振成像譜儀梯度通道的數字化研究。

sentences.english: A new method for measuring waveguide wavelength using microwave paramagnetic resonance instrument was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探討了一種利用微波順磁共振儀測量波導波長的方法。

sentences.english: FMRI uses a magnetic field to measure blood flow in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 磁共振成像是使用磁場來測量大腦的血流量。

sentences.english: The topological structure of the dendrimer spacer arms was inspected by solid-state 13C NMR.
sentences.chinese: 用13C固體核磁共振檢測了樹狀間隔臂的拓撲結構。

sentences.english: CT scans and MRI showed enlargement of right medial rectus muscle.
sentences.chinese: 電腦斷層與核磁共振皆顯示右側內直肌增大。

sentences.english: They were given M. R. I. , magnetic resonance imaging test to inspect for damaged brain tissue and signs of stroke.
sentences.chinese: 通過核磁共振成像檢查腦部受損情況以及中風的徵兆。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]

pinyin: dian4 nao3 duan4 ceng2 sao3 miao2
